docs.lead_paragraph: Tyler Varga has appeared, at times, to be unstoppable, and he attributes part of what makes him special to his sometimes odd diet and workout habits.

headline.seo: Tyler Varga of Yale Blasts Off to an Unstoppable Start
headline.main: Yale Running Back Confounds Opponents (and His Teammates, Too)
headline.print_headline: Yale Running Back Confounds Opponents (and His Teammates, Too)

docs.abstract: Profile of Yale running back Tyler Varga, who at times has appeared to be unstoppable; Varga has rushed for 12 touchdowns, which is more than all but four players in Football Bowl Subdivision and Football Championship Subdivision combined; his rushing yards per game are the most in the Ivy League by 52; in only 19 career games, Varga is seventh in Yale history with 2,082.
docs.snippet: Tyler Varga has appeared, at times, to be unstoppable, and he attributes part of what makes him special to his sometimes odd diet and workout habits.

docs.lead_paragraph: Over-the-counter drugmaker Unipharm is up for sale and has hired advisory firm Houlihan Lokey to explore a deal that could value it at around $500 million (310.83 million pounds), three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.

headline.main: Exclusive-Unipharm Hires Houlihan Lokey to Explore $500 Million Sale - Sources
headline.print_headline: Exclusive-Unipharm Hires Houlihan Lokey to Explore $500 Million Sale - Sources

docs.snippet: Over-the-counter drugmaker Unipharm is up for sale and has hired advisory firm Houlihan Lokey to explore a deal that could value it at around $500 million (310.83 million pounds), three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Kaema Plateau, the "Roof of Korea," is a stunning, forest-covered highland nestled in such treacherous mountains that it was never taken by the Allies during the Korean War. It's now a truck stop.

headline.main: AP Exclusive: A Week on the Road in North Korea
headline.print_headline: AP Exclusive: A Week on the Road in North Korea

docs.snippet: The Kaema Plateau, the "Roof of Korea," is a stunning, forest-covered highland nestled in such treacherous mountains that it was never taken by the Allies during the Korean War. It's now a truck stop.

docs.lead_paragraph: Many established spas and retreats are retooling their offerings to attract the same target: wealthy, successful and highly stressed-out executives.

headline.seo: Health Spas Aimed at Teaching Stressed Executives to Unwind

docs.abstract: Many established spas and retreats have turned their focus to fitness in effort to appeal to wealthy, highly stressed-out executives; VeraVia in California charges $1,000 roughly a day for its services, which include sessions with nutritionists, physical activities, massages and much more.
docs.snippet: Many established spas and retreats are retooling their offerings to attract the same target: wealthy, successful and highly stressed-out executives.

docs.lead_paragraph: A powerful personal food policy doesn’t have to rely on corporate benevolence or the government getting things right — thank goodness.

headline.main: (Only) Two Rules for a Good Diet

docs.snippet: A powerful personal food policy doesn’t have to rely on corporate benevolence or the government getting things right — thank goodness.
